unnormalised: Borem, mhaka konnen tori Voter ID, Aadhaar, PAN, ani driving license modhlo difference vicharlo. Tem khorench sopem asa ekdam tumi tem foddun sangtalear, bhai.
normalised: Barabor, konnem mhaka Voter I-D, Aadhaar, P-A-N, ani driving license-antle bhed vicharlem. Tem khub sope asa ekdam tumi tem fodun sangtat mhunnllear, bhai.

unnormalised: Poilem, tumchem Voter ID (officially EPIC card mhuntat) mukhy roopant voting korpakhatir asa, spashtoponnant. Tumkam hem, ani address proof, tumcho vote divpakhatir zai poddttolem. Tem electionakhatir tumchem citizenship proof mhunn chintat. Ani tem Election Commission of India dita, mhunn tachem authenticity vishvasacho asa. EPIC number 3 aksharamni suru zata, uprant ank astat, kiteim ABC1234567 sarkhem.
normalised: Poilem, tumchem Voter I-D (officially E-P-I-C card mhuntat) tem mukhy rokhhen vottingakhatir asa, khoim. Tumkam hem zai poddttole, ani addressacho puravo, tumcho vote divpakhatir. Tem tumchem electionakhatir nagrikponnacho puravo koso chint. Ani tem Election Commission of India-n dita, tenna tachi satyata pakki asta. E-P-I-C number tin aksharamni suru zata, uprant ank dita, kitem tari A-B-C ek don tin char panch so sat.

unnormalised: Uprant asa Aadhaar. Hem 12-digit number (zoxem, 1234 5678 9012) odik general identity ani address proof sarkhem asa. Tum tem kiteim korpakhatir vaprunk zata bank account ugoddcheam pasun nove SIM card gheuncheam poriant. Sarkarank tem avodtta karonn tem biometricsak joddlola asa, mhunn fake korunk avogod zata. Punn soglea poros, lok tachem complete security vishim prashn utthoytat karonn tum tem bodlunk zaina.
normalised: Uprant asa Aadhaar. Hi bara ankanchi sankhya (zoxem, ek don tin char panch so sat atth nau shunya ek don) ti eka sadharonn olkhichi ani addressacho puravo koso asa. Tumi tem kitem-ui korpak vaprunk zata bank account ugoddcheak lean sarki novi S-I-M card gheuncheak. Sarkar tem khub avgoddta kiteak tem biometricancher zoddlam, tem khotem korop khub avgodd zata. Punn sokalle sokalle, lok tachi purnn suraksha vishean prosn kortat kiteak tumi tem bodlonk zaina.

unnormalised: Nimannem, PAN (Permanent Account Number) khup zaroori asa finance-related kiteim korpakhatir, tum jannat, taxes ani vostu. Tem 10-character alphanumeric code asa Income Tax Department dita (zoxem, ABCDE1234F). Tem khorench dusre sarkhem ID proof nhoi, punn odik finance-related transactions track korpakhatir, mhunn tem address proofakhatir vaprunk naka. Ani driving license, borem, tem khup spashtoponnachem asa. Tacho mukhy hetu tum legally drive korunk zata mhunn dakhavop, ani tem ID & address proof mhunnuy kaam korta, punn fokot tumcho chukichem address aslear. DL numbers state to state badlotat, punn sadharanponnant MH-01-2024-0012345 sarkhem dista, zoim MH Maharashtra asa.
normalised: Nimannem, P-A-N (Permanent Account Number) khoinchea-ui finance-sambhandit vostunkhatir khup mhotvachem asa, tumkam khobor asa, taxes ani vostu. Tem dha aksharamchem alphanumeric code asa zo Income Tax Department dita (zoxem, A-B-C-D-E ek don tin char F). Tem dusreanchi bhaxen I-D puravo nhoi, punn odik kortukamni arthik lenden dencher nazar thevcheak asa, tenna tem addressacho puravo mhunn vaprunk naka. Ani driving license, mhunnllear, tem khup sadem asa. Tachem mukhel ud'dex tumi kaydeachi porvangi asa drove korpak dakhoincheak asa, ani tem ek I-D ani addressacho puravo koso kaam korta, punn fokot tumcho kharo address aslear. D-L number state-te state bodlota, punn sadharonnponn M-H shunya ek don don hozar ani chovis shunya shunya ek don tin char panch koso dista, zo M-H Maharashtra asa.
